parameters.name: TrackingID
parameters.description: Application-defined value for the tracking ID Value Action >0 Loop is tracked 0 Tracking of loop is stopped

title: ILoop2.SetTrackingID
description: Assigns a tracking ID to this loop.
signature:
System.Int32 SetTrackingID( 
   System.Int32
TrackingCookie
,
   System.Int32
TrackingID
)

parameters.name: TrackingID
parameters.description: Application-defined value for the tracking ID Value Action >0 Loop is tracked 0 Tracking of loop is stopped

remarks:
You can assign tracking IDs to
bodies
,
edges
,
faces
, loops, and
vertices
in parts and assemblies only; you cannot assign tracking IDs to these entities in drawings. See
Tracking IDs
for more information.
